posts.message:
Emad i have a very useful idea, i think you already implemented half of it's solution
a lot of people have an internet subscription on their phones for just facebook and twitter
so if there is a post with a link to an article for example they won't be able to read it
now remember the bot you made that compile the source code and post the result in a comment?
we could make something like it, when mentioned it will take the link, parse it's page and get the article and put it in a comment so they could read it
we could use some services like readability if they have public APIs doing this
what do you think?
A list of amazingly awesome awesomeness

posts.message:
ف حاجة عايز اعرف انا فاهمه صح ولا غلط , و جزاكم الله خيرا 
و هي الفرق بين  value and reference types
هو اناا اليل فاهمه ان ف حالة ال Value فلنفترض اننا عندنا variable و ليكن x و اسندنا اليه قيمة و لتكن 5 ثم اسندنا ال x للمتغير y
معني ذلك ان y  هياخد كوبي من القيمة المخزنة ف ال x
اما في حالة ال reference 
فلمفترض اننا عندنا Class اسمه Student و جواه id , name 
و بعد كده ف ال main خدنا object من الكلاس student , و ليكن st1و اسندنا اليه القيم 
ثم اخدنا اوبجكت من Student و ليكن st2 و اسندنا اليه الآوبجكت st1 
lمعني ذلك ان دلوقتي st2 , st1 بيشاورا ع ال address لنفس القيم الآصلية بمعني 
ان اي تغيير في القيم لاي من ال 2 اوبجكت هياثر و يظهر ع التاني

Guys, anybody have experience with D3? I am trying to create a dynamic Force-Directed Graph (like this: http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4062045). It works just fine till the number of the nodes grow. I need to be able to dynamically set the radius of the nodes according to the total amount of nodes in the graph.
Many thanks
